documentation.title: No Double Negative
documentation.standard: Detects double negation in code, which is effectively the same as a boolean cast, but with a much higher cognitive load.
documentation.code_comparison: <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) $var = $a && ! $b; if((bool) callMe($a)) {} <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) $var = $a && ! ! $b; if(! ! ! callMe($a)) {}
